title: Scheduled power cuts to continue despite rains
body_lines: 14 and 19 June will experience a 1-hour power cut in lieu of Poson poya and Father’s Day
The Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) announced that a two-hour and 15-minute power cut will be imposed countrywide till 18 June given the fuel and water shortage.
As per the schedule, 20 areas from A to W will experience power cuts between 9.00 a.m. and 10.00 p.m. countrywide.
However, the CEB said power cuts on 14 and 19 June will be limited to one-hour between 5.30 p.m. and 10.00 a.m. in lieu of Poson and Father’s Day.
